actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 in order to prevent States from imposing school breakfast program costs on localities.

summary.text: Child Nutrition Act Amendment - Amends the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 to forbid the Secretary of Agriculture from making breakfast assistance payments to a State which is required by State law to operate a breakfast program unless: (1) the costs of operating such a program under the Act are paid for solely from a portion of the State's general revenue fund and from Federal breakfast assistance payments; and (2) the State has not taken into consideration payments under the Act in determining the eligibility of local educational agencies for State aid to education, or the amount thereof.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Child Nutrition Act of 1966 in order to prevent States from imposing school breakfast program costs on localities.
